title: Actions
content: Rage Charge While Raging, you are stronger, and you deal extra damage with melee and improvised weapons, and when throwing objects. You have Resistance to physical damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws. 10 Turns Rage ends early if you don't attack an enemy on take damage each turn.You can't cast or concetrate on spells while raging.
